website_summaries.verdict: The shimmer dolls are inexpensive and come in beautiful dresses.
pros: Dresses include glitter and flowered patterns
Available in all the princesses separately or in a set
Not as well made as the classic dolls, but they have flashier outfits
cons: These dolls do not come in the traditional clothing you will recognize from the movie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: My niece recently saw Mulan and she loves it so much! She was excited to see a character that looked like her. It’s been difficult to find the doll where I live so I was very happy to find it here! The doll arrived in perfect condition and for such a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a low price.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Mulan doll in traditional Chinese dress. Well worth the $. I teach Chinese students, and they love having teaching props that they are familiar with. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Annunaki Utonium

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: So pretty came in packaging no damages no problems. Item as pictured nothing to complain about for me. Great doll i love mulan and want my daughter to get into her and merida instead of the disney damsels.
customer_reviews.author: ToriS

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful doll. Daughter loves Mulan.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy. We got it a day early too. The only bad thing i have to say was that the package that the doll comes in was smushed.
customer_reviews.author: Trenee

customer_reviews.title: Great little gift for girls.
customer_reviews.text: Mulan's clothes stayed sparkly even after my daughter washed them. Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H

customer_reviews.title: not great quality doll, doll packaging damaged
customer_reviews.text: The doll itself is not the greatest quality. The dolls directly sold through Disney are better and can be purchased for the same amount. The packaging was badly damaged and as it was a gift, I removed it and packed it on my own. This was a disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra T

customer_reviews.title: Not the classic Mulan
customer_reviews.text: My daughter does not recognize this princess, and the box is squeezed when it is delivered. two stars, cannot be more.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 year old cousin and it was absolutely perfect! She played with it all night long.
customer_reviews.author: Sara T. Cestaric

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: The person I gave this two loves it and is happy to have it for her collection.
customer_reviews.author: NDcowdog

customer_reviews.title: great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a great product. Perfect for little girls!
customer_reviews.author: D&A White

customer_reviews.title: Cheap doll
customer_reviews.text: Not as expected. Cheap toy. I was not happy. Arm broke in 1st day
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice doll. My 8 year old loves her.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome doll!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the princess doll house my daughter got! They've gotten a ton of use and help up well!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a cake! It came out perfect 👌
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, but the hair gets tangled very easily and even when you brush it out, the ends are frayed
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Prill

product_meta.title: Disney Princess Royal Shimmer Mulan Doll - E0280
product_meta.description:
Mulan is ready for shimmering adventures with your little princess! Royal Shimmer Mulan dazzles in a dress featuring signature colors and images from her story and a special watercolor design! Your little dreamer will love playing out magical moments from Disney's Mulan, as well as imagining her own fairy tale with this beloved Princess. 



Copyright Disney

Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Doll features a shimmering gown in her signature color
Includes doll, outfit, and pair of shoes.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars91 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
